articles.title: ‘Dragon of death’: South America’s largest pterosaur had a wingspan of nearly 30 feet - Express
articles.description: THE LARGEST pterosaur ever discovered in South America - which had a wingspan of nearly 30 feet and has been dubbed the 'dragon of death' - has been unearthed in Argentina.
